column5: This single bedroom is like no other, in that you'll have the unique advantage to enjoy the outdoors on my secluded acreage, so you'll never feel confined to your room.   Just 5 minutes to dining, drinking, swimming, and horses to pet & feed. Only a mile from the White Rock Arboretum for jogging or sightseeing, and 8 minutes from downtown.
column8: Secluded room on acreage near White Rock Lake
